status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmamf","text":"Prepare loading buffer as a 1:9 ratio of 2-Mercaptoethanol ( ) to 4x Leammli sample loading buffer (ie.,  2-Mercaptoethanol +   Leammli buffe).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":105,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4rav","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"361CA600307811EE934B91C9DE9B3230","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3EA14830307811EE934B91C9DE9B3230","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"450","error":false,"guid":"4161EED0307811EE934B91C9DE9B3230","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nu3i","text":"Denature protein by boiling at  for   in the Thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"epor1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2BB7AB10307811EE934B91C9DE9B3230","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"99","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"BCB7C730307D11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5b6e0","text":"Select right concentration of TGX precast gel (Biorad) to run and remove comb from the casing by seesawing under running RO water) until it gently pops out. Remove the bottom strip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2oj98","text":"Load your samples and   of protein ladder. Empty wells get loading buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2i9dn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"D1D75720307D11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qknq","text":"(optional) After rinsing with RO water, Stain membrane by pouring Ponceau S solution covering the membrane and incubate for  . Bands of protein should become visible. Pour the solution back into its original bottle, and rinse with RO water three times until the background stain disappears. After imaging, wash with TBS or PBS for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":124,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":331,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a0bnq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"A368C8F0307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"ABB93BC0307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41cih","text":"Discard the blocking solution from your membrane and add the antibody solution. Incubate in the cold room  on a shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9prli","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"034B9950307F11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7k7f5","text":"The next day, either discard the 1°antibody solution or save it by pouring it into a tube (stable for two weeks)(unless it is milk, in which you should discard it before it spoils).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"710vn","text":"Wash three times for  each with wash buffer (TBST or PBST).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dhp5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"228AB6C0307F11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6c8c","text":" Mix samples with loading buffer as a 3:1 raitio to dilute proteins out to be the same protein amount (protein quantification is needed. Usually, protein per each loading is  , mini gel max capacity:   per well, midi gel:   per well)\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":174,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":200,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":222,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"enaml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15-30","error":false,"guid":"7933B0A0307D11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30-35","error":false,"guid":"A1428300307D11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20-30","error":false,"guid":"B56AE1B0307D11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lnmh","text":"Prepare running buffer by diluting out 10X Tri Glycine SDS Buffer (Biorad).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2utki","text":"Prepare tank and gel inserted in it. Then fill the compartment surrounding the gels and loading area with running buffer. Lift your gel gasket briefly to remove any bubbles at the bottom.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mgnt","text":"Examine your gel to see if any wells are distorted or bent out of shape. If so, take a pipette tip and gently nudge the wells back into place. Remove bubbles from wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vijk","text":"Pry gel out of plastic cast by separating both sides at the margins. Use a tool to cut out the wells and the peripheries of the gel. Then slightly wash with RO.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5b3b3","text":"Affix the lid and run at 80 V for  . Check to see if the gel is running properly, then increase voltage to 120 V. Run until the loading buffer reaches the bottom of the gel. Approx. time: 1~1.5 hours depending on size of proteins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"biqn2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"D627EC90307D11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ode8","text":"Open a tray of the Turbo-Blot transfer machine (Biorad). Place the upper layer of the Trans-Blot Turbo mini or midi transfer pack (Biorad) in the tray with upward membrane direction. Remove any bubbles with a roller.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddl6e","text":"Remove from Turbo-Blot transfer machine, cut the membrane down to size, and cut a corner of the membrane to denote its orientation. Use a pencil to mark the membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"be0li","text":"Lifting from the denser bottom, place the gel onto the membrane. Place the remaining layer of the Blot membrane to sandwich the gel. Remove any bubbles with a roller.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ktsv","text":"Turbo -\u003e size of gel (mini, midi, 2 mini)-\u003e A or B -\u003e run. Midi gel:  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1j2ib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":420,"guid":"47EEF800307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ariu","text":"Close the lid and insert the tray back into the Turbo-Blot transfer machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vo02","text":"Dry the membrane for   at  sandwiched between two blotting papers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ekpt3","text":"PVDF membrane: Reactivate with 100% methanol for  , then wash with TBS or PBS for 5 min (alpha synuclein antibody: instead of drying and MeOH activation, incubate the membrane in fixation solution (4% paraformaldehyde + 0.01% glutaraldehyde) for  . after fixation, washing with TBS or PBS for  three times)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":246,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":293,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d4or8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"4E956450307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"514457B0307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":20,"guid":"586FF990307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"5D429040307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"61CA6250307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kd7s","text":" Block the membrane in 50% Intercept blocking buffer (LI-COR, dilute with 1X TBS or PBS) with   skim milk for   by shaking incubation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":94,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8fgjc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"CAF7BCF0307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":15}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"ED631410307E11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sqm4","text":"Prepare your 1°antibody solution by diluting your 1°antibody in its required dilution (42/α-Synuclein\nBD science: 1000X) in Intercept antibody diluent solution(LI-COR or the same Intercept blocking buffer containing 0.2% tween 20) with the same composition used in blocking solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50rnb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vj0g","text":" Create 2° antibody solution by diluting 2° antibody of your choice and of corresponding species with Intercept antibody diluent with the same composition used in blocking solution, incubating for no more than   at   on the shaker. (2° antibody dilutions are generally 1:10,000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":210,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":215,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7vu4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"3397F2C0307F11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"369C0B00307F11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cslvq","text":"Wash three times for   each with wash buffer (TBST or PBST).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cidea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3D9D4180307F11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j9q","text":"Stain the membrane with ECL solution (SuperSiganal West Pico PLUS, Peroxide solution : enhanced solution = 1:1) for   and take image with Chemidoc MP (Biorad)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"p4jk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"43F825E0307F11EEA9EA6FD06B36C602","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
